entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -35.3°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
